//Â EncodeÂ theÂ payloadÂ asÂ JSON

//Â BuildÂ theÂ binaryÂ notification

//å‘é€å¤šä¸ªå°±è°ƒç”¨å¤šæ¬¡fwrite
//$resultÂ =Â fwrite($fp,Â $msg,Â strlen($msg));
echoÂ $msg;
ifÂ (!$result)
Â Â Â Â echoÂ 'MessageÂ notÂ delivered'Â .Â PHP_EOL;
else
Â Â Â Â echoÂ 'MessageÂ successfullyÂ delivered'Â .Â PHP_EOL;
//Â CloseÂ theÂ connectionÂ toÂ theÂ server
fclose($fp);
